title: Scalable Spatiotemporal Inference with Biased Scan Attention Transformer Neural Processes
summary: This paper introduces BSA-TNP, a new Neural Process architecture for scalable spatiotemporal inference. It models stochastic processes that evolve in both space and time, offering improved accuracy and training speed for applications in various fields.
